product_summary: Pythagora is a dev tool that builds apps from scratch by talking to you. It is powered by GPT Pilot and GPT-4, and it uses a conversational interface to help you define your app's requirements, select the right technologies, and write the code. Pythagora is designed to be easy to use, even for junior developers, and it can help you to create production-ready apps in a fraction of the time it would take to do it manually.
product_pros: Fast growth (junior developer to senior in a day)
Easy to use (idea to working app in 2 days)
Handles complex tasks (e.g., writing automated tests, deploying apps to the cloud)
product_cons: May not be suitable for all types of apps
Requires a good understanding of software development concepts
Can be expensive for some users
May not be as flexible as traditional coding tools
